title: TensorFlow Lite for iOS (Coding TensorFlow)
excerpt: In this episode of Coding TensorFlow, Laurence Moroney, Developer Advocate for TensorFlow at Google, talks us through how TensorFlow Lite works on iOS. You'll see how to deploy a trained model to an iOS App, and how you can run inference with it, using C++ called from a Swift App.  Building TensorFlow
